#text=This morning , I finished reading the book I checked out the week before .
#text=After breakfast , I went to the library with my partner .
#text=I dropped my book off in the return bin after we walked in .
#text=She wanted to look at the section in the far back of the library , concerning the history of wood furniture .
#text=Science fiction is the genre I typically read , so I went in that direction .
#text=I browsed the long aisles for my favorite author , and saw that they had two copies of the book I was wanting to check out .
#text=I left quickly to the drinking fountain , and came back to find that there was only one copy left .
#text=I picked up the book and went to go find my partner , who had also found her book .
#text=The checkout line was fast , we had our library cards ready for the attendant and had no issue checking out the books .
#text=The drive home was relaxing , and we began reading right away after returning to the living room .
